changeSet.author: jhipster
changeSet.createView: select a.frozen_box_code,a.id,a.sample_type_name,a.status,a.memo,a.project_code,a.project_name,count_of_sample, a.equipment_code,a.area_code,a.support_rack_code,a.columns_in_shelf,a.rows_in_shelf, (a.equipment_code||'.'||a.area_code||'.'||a.support_rack_code ||'.'||a.columns_in_shelf || lpad(a.rows_in_shelf,2,0)) as position, sc.sample_classification_name,temp.stock_out_requirement_id from( select stock_out_requirement_id,frozen_box_id,count(1) as count_of_sample from stock_out_req_frozen_tube rt group by stock_out_requirement_id,frozen_box_id) temp left join frozen_box a on temp.frozen_box_id = a.id left join sample_classification sc on a.sample_classification_id = sc.id
